Taruvaya avanu nim'mannu (tayiya garbhadinda) sisuvagi horategeyuttane â€“ nivu yavvanavannu talupalu hagu a balika vrd'dharagi bidalu. Nim'malli kelavaru adakke munnave mrtaragi biduttare mattu (itararu ulidiruttare) â€“ nivu ondu nirdista avadhiyannu talupabeku hagu bud'dhivantaragabekendu
